entry.title: Welcome to my blog!
entry.content:
I just started writing posts recently, and I will try to write some fun stuff here.

I do have a post about technical details like pytorch, linux etc. at here if you are interested in. (Note that they are being reformated right now to make the contents in order).
entry.summary: I just started writing posts recently, and I will try to write some fun stuff here.

entry.title: Play with former National Basketball Player - Kyranbek Makan

link.title: Play with former National Basketball Player - Kyranbek Makan

entry.content:
Kyranbek Makan, a former Chinese National Basketball player, visited our Campus! It is a great honor to play with him!

He is really a nice guy, and Iâ€™ve learnt a lot from him.
entry.summary: It is honored to play with former Chinese National Basketball Player - Kyranbek Makan
